arguments.context: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response. Default: view One of: view, embed, edit
arguments.page: Current page of the collection. Default: 1
arguments.per_page: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Default: 10
arguments.search: Limit results to those matching a string.
arguments.after: Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.
arguments.author: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors.
arguments.author_exclude: Ensure result set excludes posts assigned to specific authors.
arguments.before: Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.
arguments.exclude: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.
arguments.include: Limit result set to specific IDs.
arguments.offset: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.
arguments.order: Order sort attribute ascending or descending. Default: desc One of: asc, desc
arguments.orderby: Sort collection by object attribute. Default: date One of: author, date, id, include, modified, parent, relevance, slug, include_slugs, title
arguments.slug: Limit result set to posts with one or more specific slugs.
arguments.status: Limit result set to posts assigned one or more statuses. Default: publish
arguments.categories: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy.
arguments.categories_exclude: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy.
arguments.tags: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy.
arguments.tags_exclude: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy.
arguments.sticky: Limit result set to items that are sticky.

arguments.date: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.
arguments.date_gmt: The date the object was published, as GMT.
arguments.slug: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type.
arguments.status: A named status for the object. One of: publish, future, draft, pending, private
arguments.password: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt.
arguments.title: The title for the object.
arguments.author: The ID for the author of the object.
arguments.featured_media: The ID of the featured media for the object.
arguments.comment_status: Whether or not comments are open on the object. One of: open, closed
arguments.ping_status: Whether or not the object can be pinged. One of: open, closed
arguments.format: The format for the object. One of: standard, aside, chat, gallery, link, image, quote, status, video, audio
arguments.sticky: Whether or not the object should be treated as sticky.
arguments.template: The theme file to use to display the object.
arguments.categories: The terms assigned to the object in the category taxonomy.
arguments.tags: The terms assigned to the object in the post_tag taxonomy.

arguments.context: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response. Default: view One of: view, embed, edit
arguments.password: The password for the post if it is password protected.

arguments.date: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.
arguments.date_gmt: The date the object was published, as GMT.
arguments.slug: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type.
arguments.status: A named status for the object. One of: publish, future, draft, pending, private
arguments.password: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt.

arguments.categories: The terms assigned to the object in the category taxonomy.
arguments.tags: The terms assigned to the object in the post_tag taxonomy.

arguments.force: Whether to bypass trash and force deletion.

date.content: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone. Context: view, edit, embed

date_gmt.content: The date the object was published, as GMT. Context: view, edit

guid.content: The globally unique identifier for the object. Read only Context: view, edit

id.content: Unique identifier for the object. Read only Context: view, edit, embed

link.content: URL to the object. Read only Context: view, edit, embed

modified.content: The date the object was last modified, in the site's timezone. Read only Context: view, edit

modified_gmt.content: The date the object was last modified, as GMT. Read only Context: view, edit

slug.content: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type. Context: view, edit, embed

status.content: A named status for the object. Context: view, edit One of: publish, future, draft, pending, private

type.content: Type of Post for the object. Read only Context: view, edit, embed

password.content: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt. Context: edit

permalink_template.content: Permalink template for the object. Read only Context: edit

generated_slug.content: Slug automatically generated from the object title. Read only Context: edit

title.content: The title for the object. Context: view, edit, embed

content.content: The content for the object. Context: view, edit

author.content: The ID for the author of the object. Context: view, edit, embed

excerpt.content: The excerpt for the object. Context: view, edit, embed

featured_media.content: The ID of the featured media for the object. Context: view, edit, embed

comment_status.content: Whether or not comments are open on the object. Context: view, edit One of: open, closed

ping_status.content: Whether or not the object can be pinged. Context: view, edit One of: open, closed

format.content: The format for the object. Context: view, edit One of: standard, aside, chat, gallery, link, image, quote, status, video, audio

sticky.content: Whether or not the object should be treated as sticky. Context: view, edit

template.content: The theme file to use to display the object. Context: view, edit

categories.content: The terms assigned to the object in the category taxonomy. Context: view, edit

tags.content: The terms assigned to the object in the post_tag taxonomy. Context: view, edit
